thread.title: Deadpool: Ryan Reynolds Comments On Oscar Nominations
thread.title_full: Deadpool: Ryan Reynolds Comments On Oscar Nominations

author: Matthew Mueller
title: Deadpool: Ryan Reynolds Comments On Oscar Nominations
text:
Deadpool: Ryan Reynolds Comments On Oscar Nominations Matthew Mueller Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
Well, the Academy decided to keep the status quo for another year, as they left out Ryan Reynold's Deadpool from any nominations. 
While many assumed that would be the case, there were some who really thought the attention the film received would translate into at least one nomination for Reynolds. Sadly that was not the case , but Reynolds doensn't hold any ill will towards the other films that did make the list. Reynolds tweeted "Regularly scheduled tickle-fight at Camp #Deadpool is still on. Congrats to all the nominees for these brilliant films. #Oscars2017." He had previously said that if Deadpool scored a nomination he would post a crazy reaction video, though knowing Reynolds he still very well might. 
Regularly scheduled tickle-fight at Camp #Deadpool is still on. Congrats to all the nominees for these brilliant films. #Oscars2017 — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) January 24, 2017 
Deadpool creator Rob Liefeld also posted a reaction to the announcement and shared some similar positive thoughts which included congratulating Marvel Studios and DC Films on their nominations. "Congrats to comic book films Doctor Strange and Suicide Squad on their nominations!" Doctor Strange was nominated for Best Visual Effects and Suicide Squad was nominated for Best Makeup and Hairstyling. 
Congrats to comic book films Dr. Strange and Suicide Squad on their nominations! 
You can view all the nominees here . 
Based upon Marvel Comics ’ most unconventional anti-hero, Deadpool tells the origin story of former Special Forces operative turned mercenary Wade Wilson, who after being subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopts the alter ego Deadpool. Armed with his new abilities and a dark, twisted sense of humor, Deadpool hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life. 
Deadpool is directed by Tim Miller and written by Rhett Reese and Paul Wernick. Deadpool stars Ryan Reynolds , Morena Baccarin, Ed Skrein, T.J. Miller, Gina Carano, Leslie Uggams, Brianna Hildebrand and Stefan Kapičić. 
Deadpool's Holiday Blu-ray package is now available and retails for $25.99. Deadpool 2 is expected to begin filming next year and is due out January 12, 2018.
